mapper.select:
select distinct suser.id,login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,sur.create_date,province,city,county from sys_user suser
left join sys_user_relation sur on suser.id=sur.rel_user_id
left join customer_extends custext on suser.id=custext.customer_id

select count(distinct suser.id) from sys_user suser
left join customer_extends custext on suser.id=custext.customer_id
and suser.id in
#{resellerId}
select id, supplier_id, login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,create_date,province,city,county,is_root from sys_user where id=#{id} and account_state = 1
select id from sys_user where login_name=#{loginName} and corporater_mobile=#{mobile} and account_state = 1 limit 1;

select id,login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,create_date,account_state,province,city,county, supplier_id from sys_user where invitationCode=#{inviteCode} and account_state = 1 and user_type IN (12,13)

select suser.id from sys_user suser left join sys_label_relation channelUser on suser.id=channelUser.rel_id
left join sys_user_relation userRel on suser.id=userRel.rel_user_id
left join customer_extends custext on suser.id=custext.customer_id

select distinct suser.id from sys_user suser left join sys_user_relation userRel on suser.id=userRel.rel_user_id
left join customer_extends custext on suser.id=custext.customer_id

select suser.id,login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,suser.create_date,account_state,province,city,county from sys_user suser left join sys_label_relation channelUser on suser.id=channelUser.rel_id
select count(suser.id) from sys_user suser left join sys_label_relation channelUser on suser.id=channelUser.rel_id

select suser.id,login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,suser.create_date,account_state,province,city,county from sys_user suser left join sys_user_relation userRel on suser.id=userRel.rel_user_id
select count(suser.id) from sys_user suser left join sys_user_relation userRel on suser.id=userRel.rel_user_id

select count(distinct suser.id) from sys_user suser
left join sys_user_relation sur on suser.id=sur.rel_user_id
left join customer_extends custext on suser.id=custext.customer_id

SELECT suser.id,suser.supplier_id,login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,sur.create_date,province,city,county FROM sys_user suser LEFT JOIN sys_user_relation sur ON suser.id=sur.user_id
SELECT count(suser.id) FROM sys_user suser LEFT JOIN sys_user_relation sur ON suser.id=sur.user_id

select distinct suser.id,login_name,corporater,corporater_mobile,name,address,reseller_type,province,city,county from sys_user suser
limit #{page.startIndex} , #{page.pageSize}
select count(distinct suser.id) from sys_user suser
